entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued March 20 at 1:57PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...STORMY START TO THE WEEK... Southeast Alaska should ready for periods of rain, light snow, and wind through at least mid-week. While a weaker storm presses northward across the Panhandle through Monday, a stronger storm approaches the Panhandle from the south. This storm arrives with strong, gusty winds; rainfall; and higher elevation snow late
